# init(identifier:)

**Initializer**

Creates an option object with the given identifier string.

## Declaration

```swift
init(identifier: String)
```

## Discussion

Use this initializer to create custom compression options.

## Creating a compression option

- **init()**: Creates an option object containing no options.
- **init(options:)**: Creates an option object that represents the union of the supplied options.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates an option object from data in an unarchiver.
